alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 30 at 2:38PM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST SATURDAY THROUGH 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches . For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches, except 24 to 36 inches above 6000 ft possible. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains zones. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from 5 AM MST Saturday through 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS..Winds will create periods of blowing snow Friday through Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
